    at={(22.25cm,2cm)}, %4.75
    hide axis,
    scale only axis,
    height=0pt,
    width=0pt,
    colormap={reverse viridis}{
       indices of colormap={
       \pgfplotscolormaplastindexof{viridis},...,0 of viridis}
    },
    colorbar horizontal,
    point meta min=0,
    point meta max=50,
    label style={font=\Huge},
    tick label style={font=\Huge},
    colorbar style={
       width=7cm,
       xtick={50, 25, 0},
    }]
